mapper.select: select count(*) as total from PRODUCT where pcnum like '%'||#{searchName}||'%' pid like '%'||#{searchName}||'%' pname like '%'||#{searchName}||'%' 1=1
mapper.insert: insert into PRODUCT(pid, pname, pprice, pstock, pimage1addr, pimage2addr, pcnum, pdetail) values(#{pid}, #{pname}, #{pprice}, #{pstock}, #{pimage1addr}, #{pimage2addr}, #{pcnum}, #{pdetail})
mapper.update: update PRODUCT set pname = #{pname}, pprice = #{pprice}, pstock = #{pstock}, pimage = #{pimage}, pcnum = #{pcnum}, pdetail = #{pdetail}, where pid = #{pid}
mapper.select: SELECT To_CHAR(salesdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as salesdate, sum(salescount) as salescount, sum(salesprice) as salesprice FROM SALES GROUP BY salesdate ORDER BY salesdate
